name: Chaos Devil Battler Zattan
description:
A small game for the Gunner Parade 22 winter jam.

A shmup with beat 'em up elements. Race against the clock and clear out waves as fast as possible!

The game is divided into 7 sectors. To win,all of them must be cleared before you run out of time.

There are 3 forms you can switch between, each with 2 basic attacks and 1 special attack (press attack 1 & 2 at the same time). Switch between forms on the fly and combine their different attacks to maximize your damage.

Weapons have unique properties and affect enemies (and their bullets) differently, so try out different strategies!

The game is an experiment of trying to combine the two very different genres - so any feedback is very welcome.

Default keyboard controls

  • Arrow keys - movement
  • A - Form Switch Backward
  • S - Form Switch Forward
  • Z - Attack 1
  • X - Attack 2
  • Enter - Start
